Steps for C++ code compilation and execution in Linux :      
1. git clone https://github.com/Vaishnavjay/Assignment-6---DSA.git       
2. cd Assignment-6---DSA/      
3. g++ -std=c++11 main.cpp bignum.cpp -o main     
4. ./main
